dict.acceptation: 好奇的； 好求知的；奇妙的； 稀奇的；

sent.orig: Pug put all other mail aside, and stared at the curious communication from the curious man.
sent.trans: 帕格把其他信件摆在一边，注视着这封来自一位奇人的奇怪的信。

sent.orig: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
sent.trans: 少关心别人的逸闻私事，多留意别人的思路观点。

sent.orig: A curious thing happened as China's renminbi-denominated A-shares tumbled yesterday.
sent.trans: 前天，当中国内地以人民币计价的A股市场暴跌之时，一件奇怪的事情也随之发生了。

sent.orig: And the curious thing about this record is that it doesn't matter in the least.
sent.trans: 关于这个记录的奇怪事情是最终都没有产生作用。

sent.orig: These gardens are not large but curious in their designs.
sent.trans: 这些庭园规模不大，但设计巧妙。
